org.jcatapult.mvc.message.scope
Class SessionScope

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.mvc.message.scope.AbstractJEEScope
      org.jcatapult.mvc.message.scope.SessionScope
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scope
public class SessionScope
extends AbstractJEEScope

This is the message scope which fetches and stores values in the HttpSession.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Method Detail

getFieldMessages

public Map<String,List<String>> getFieldMessages(MessageType type)
Correctly synchronizes the session.

Parameters:
type - Used to determine the key to lookup the message map from.
Returns:
The Map or an empty map if the session doesn't contain the FieldMessages yet.

addFieldMessage

public void addFieldMessage(MessageType type,
                            String fieldName,
                            String message)
Correctly synchronizes the context and the FieldMessages object.

Parameters:
type - Used to determine the key to lookup the message map from.
fieldName - The name of the field.
message - The message to append.

getActionMessages

public List<String> getActionMessages(MessageType type)
Correctly synchronizes the session.

Parameters:
type - Used to determine the key to lookup the message map from.
Returns:
The List or an empty List if the session doesn't contain the action messages yet.

addActionMessage

public void addActionMessage(MessageType type,
                             String message)
Correctly synchronizes the session and the action messages List.

Parameters:
type - Used to determine the key to lookup the message map from.
message - The message to append.

clearActionMessages

public void clearActionMessages(MessageType type)
Clears all of the action messages of the given type from the scope completely.

Parameters:
type - The message type to clear.

clearFieldMessages

public void clearFieldMessages(MessageType type)
Clears all of the field messages of the given type from the scope completely.

Parameters:
type - The message type to clear.
